description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take the role of an angry and violent woodsman on a journey to take back what's his.  Slash and carve your way through a bloody forest of ravenous creatures to track down the fabled Stag!  Invite your friends along in this violently gory forest adventure. Team up against wolves, hunters and bears and fight your way to victory.
description.short: Take the role of an angry and violent woodsman on a journey to take back what's his.  Slash and carve your way through a bloody forest of ravenous creatures to track down the fabled Stag!  Invite your friends along in this violently gory forest adventure. Team up against wolves, hunters and bears and fight your way to victory.
